lender.name: Clayton
lender.loan_because: I have seen what a difference a micro-loan can make in a persons life first hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Church, helping to organize programs and church operations.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to support communities around the world with the small amount that I can afford to give.
lender.occupational_info: I help to raise money for a non-profit organization that helps children adults and thier families

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: we should do unto our neighbors as we would have them do unto ourselves!
lender.occupational_info: I care for my three small children and I am in school.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I want to serve others and contribute to making a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach yoga, do health and wellness coaching which empowers women to take care of themselves.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I feel we all have a responsibility to give to others and make the world a better place in some way!

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want my daughter to know that we can make a difference.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping someone start a new life and livelihood.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others is in my nature. I love to know I have made a difference...even a small one.

lender.name: Cool Cats in Hats
lender.loan_because: We want to help give people a start so they can help themselves
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of women who get together for fun. We belong to the Red Hat Society

lender.name: beek
lender.loan_because: i can and like to help those who are helping themselves. also because i know how the money will be used.
lender.occupational_info: retired postal worker. presently part time carpenters helper.

lender.name: JHeels
lender.loan_because: as a student, I understand and respect the value of borrowing money as a way to advance a career or a business to better provide for one's self, family and community.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe that we can help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I am an 8th grade student.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I represent a cohort of senior school students that want to donate to an ethically and socially responsible organisation.
lender.occupational_info: Education

lender.name: Lea
lender.loan_because: doing the right thing is always the right thing . . .

lender.name: Chad
lender.occupational_info: I am a 7th generation Texan! I am also an architect and design public schools for the children of Texas.

lender.name: Coreen
lender.loan_because: I want to make it easier for someone to do better in life.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I am not working. I am looking for something I would like to do in the way of helping people.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: A loan is empowering for the recipient. By agreeing to pay back a loan, a business owner takes on the responsibility of making their business successful. I also loan to show my students how beneficial this process can be, not only to the business owner, but to their entire community.
lender.occupational_info: When I am not teaching math, I teach middle school students to be social entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives and the lives of their children.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I like to help people realize their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I write television stories, book stories and cinema stories. I also take photographs of people and the lives they live

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I'd like to tell you I loan because I want to change the world. Truth be known I like the rush of lending money and watching it repaid. I get excited about the prospect of lending again, reading the profiles, seeing someone in a field I find interesting. It's like a real life version of SIMS or some other computer strategy game. The fact that people IRL are helped is a bonus!
lender.occupational_info: I manage Information Technology (IT) projects for a Charter School District located in the inner city communities of Los Angeles, CA.

lender.name: Chad & Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I make movies.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: we are all one, and abundance is circular.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: In an world where there are many inequalities I am committed to sharing resources. I also believe in enterprise and encouraging those who have commitment and drive.
lender.occupational_info: I write about things I am passionate about - the natural world, human suffering and joy, how to stay connected.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: It is gratifying to help others, especially those who have taken the huge step of starting their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop computer software. My business partner is my adult son. I am 63 years old, married, and live near Kansas City.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I think it is great opportunity to empower individuals and create opportunities for long term sustainability for families and communities in need.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Creative/Artsy.

lender.name: Lorn
lender.loan_because: My dad showed me the Kiva site. I hope someone can benefit from my donation. My younger brother and sister loan too.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school senior. I work part-time as a dance instructor and a second job in a clothing store.

lender.name: Robert
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy lending assistance to people who are working hard to help themselves.

lender.name: Chuck & Nancy
lender.loan_because: We want to make a positive difference in our world.
lender.occupational_info: We work with computer systems at hospitals and clinics.

lender.name: Marielle
lender.loan_because: We can do more together than alone.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I believe in people.

lender.name: Elena
lender.loan_because: It doesn't hurt me financially to lend small amount of money, but these same money can make huge difference in somebody's life. Its a gift for me to be able to share my earnings with others in such a great way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in doctor's office.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It's important to see ourselves as citizens of the world,and extending the hand of help is part of that.

lender.name: CHINMAO
lender.loan_because: I need money to pay tuition.
lender.occupational_info: Technical support

lender.name: Sandrine
lender.loan_because: I want to help, and I think that direct microcredit is the best way.

lender.name: Marc and Edith
lender.loan_because: Not everyone has access to capital to make their projects come true. Kiva is a way of allowing people to become self-sufficient and independent.
lender.occupational_info: Marc plans electrical networks and Edith is an IT analyst.

lender.name: senthil
lender.loan_because: i need to start a bussiness
lender.occupational_info: garments buying & selling

lender.name: JennyReviews.com
lender.occupational_info: JennyReviews.com is a product review site.

lender.name: Fanny
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowerment and development through entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Gerard
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Bjoern
lender.loan_because: I got a gift certificate.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure food is safe for consumption.

lender.name: Heath
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a little help sometimes :)

lender.name: Spike
lender.whereabouts: West Pennant Hills New South Wales
lender.loan_because: Small economies need help too.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: We al need help at sometime in our lives. Those of us who received such help should pass on the gift.
lender.occupational_info: I provide new homes for people. Sometimes this is their first home. In other cases they may have sold their first home to build a new one. In all cases my goal is to make their dream come true.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to live in a country that offers so many opportunities, therefore it is my duty to make sure that I help others be successful in their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach elementary school children in grades K-6 in Philadelphia. I also learn from them every day!

lender.name: Lars Hallvard
lender.loan_because: it makes sense!

lender.name: Demetrios
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world to become a better place, and you are striving to make that happen. So, if I can help you, then together we can help change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help non-profit organizations / associations in every sector (educational, healthcare, cultural, religious, environmental & advocacy) raise money to fund capital, annual and development needs.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus and want to help and serve His beautiful children - they are worthy!

lender.name: D. Lee
lender.loan_because: Thousands of candles can be lit from a single candle, and the life of that one candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared. (Sutta Nipata).
lender.occupational_info: A beginner venture capitalist that feels the rush to give back... I have enjoyed the good kamma to have touched and tasted life as a humanitarian worker for over a decade.

lender.name: Jean-Claude
lender.loan_because: I do care for others and, coming from a rich privileged country, I want to help people who have ideas but lack of money.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the French government.

lender.name: Leo Johnson
lender.occupational_info: Transforming data into information, information into knowledge, and knowledge into action.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: Im a student and I want to be a product designer when i grow up

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: I help to raise money from the local government to fund arts organizations.

lender.name: JAN E
lender.loan_because: being able to help
lender.occupational_info: interesting and challenging

lender.name: Albouri
lender.loan_because: The world is small place. And you are my neighbor.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying development issues

lender.name: Steph
lender.loan_because: the spirit of giving has been instilled in me from a very young age and this is also an opportunity to teach my children to value what they have and to give what they can.
lender.occupational_info: assisting adolescents and their families in overcoming the obstacles in their lives, through coordinating a network of personal and community supports.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I build the systems that manufacturers use to make things like cars, food, etc.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: I design and inspect bridges

lender.name: sara
lender.loan_because: I am very Blessed and I want to share the gifts God has provided me for good.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I've been operating my own business for seven years now. It makes me very happy to be able to help other people just like me who are making their own way. I don't have to be a millionaire to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I design and make rosaries and jewelry.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I can. Inspired by my father who wanted to change the world...2/12/50--7/13/08. A Cancer patient and a US Army Viet Nam Vet. In His honor....
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate broker. I help families buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Help is four letters, but it worth thousand words.

lender.name: Tuula
lender.loan_because: I want to support other entrepreneurs who don't have much but still try their best to create a better life for them and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I publish e-books and info products.

lender.name: SEBASTIEN
lender.loan_because: I believe on the system including in our industrial countries Europe or US

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: I think this is a practical way of allowing people to access moneies through non traditional means. Traditional lending is often for people who are already in higher socioeconomic standing.
lender.occupational_info: I educate communities about desease prevention and health promotion specializing in Harm reduction and sexual health.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance! I also would love to see people succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying Social Work at California State University, CHICO.

lender.name: Lars Lindgren
lender.loan_because: I think it will help

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: I am interested in empowering others to lift themselves towards success.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: we all need a break sometimes. . .

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: sometimes it's the actions of individuals helping individuals that make the biggest difference in our big, crazy world.
lender.occupational_info: I help Penn State distance education students progress through their degrees for a living. My academic background is in political economics, and I write related commentaries and conduct research as curiosity strikes. Forthcoming web page and blog!

lender.name: warren
lender.loan_because: i enjoy helping others and myself in so doing.
lender.occupational_info: i invent things...

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: it's one small way to help make a bigger difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I organize events and raise money for a non-profit medical research institution.

lender.name: Fred and Pam
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help people that you don't know. We just want to share some of what God has blessed us with.

lender.name: Jrgen
lender.loan_because: I love my life and enjoy a fair wealth. That circumstance obliges to help.
lender.occupational_info: Lawyer for criminal Law.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I hope it is good business.
lender.occupational_info: consulting to farmers who grow crops

lender.name: Leigh Madeira
lender.occupation: Investment Analyst and Former Kiva Fellow
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to make a better life for themselves

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: We allow people to use their online influence to raise money for charities that they care about.

lender.name: Gopal
lender.loan_because: I, too, am an entrepreneur, and know what it's like to have someone care enough to invest in my dreams. I believe firmly in helping others, and am so grateful for the for the opportunity to pass along what I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I am the CEO of a project called IDIL(ideal). We are a group of people dedicated to the fulfillment of the highest states of human potential; to the acceptance of all faiths, beliefs, and paths, with a focus on unity in diversity; to cultivating a path to and an awareness of every individuals own inner strength trough the nurturing and growth of the understanding of the power of thought.

lender.name: Kay and Dave
lender.loan_because: helping hard-working people who want to help themselves makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: Kay works in an office and writes and edits books which are used for teaching children and adults. Dave is a construction manager who builds bridges and roads.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I believe in positive karma, and the power of community.
lender.occupational_info: My favorite quotes are: "Be the change you wish to see in the world," (Gandhi), and "think globally, act locally".

lender.name: Lonny
lender.loan_because: Everyone should seek to help someone around him/her achieve a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I will soon graduate medical school and begin my training as a family physician, providing primary medical and preventive care to those in my community of all ages.

lender.name: Mary Anne
lender.loan_because: One less pair of shoes for me could mean the independence and/or survival of another.

lender.name: Jaclyn
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Kiva Divas
lender.occupation: the six of us work in many fields
lender.loan_because: We loan in celebration of each other, honoring moments of personal significance by collectively paying forward our prosperity
lender.occupational_info: A circle of friends united in the belief that together we can make the world a better place

lender.name: Taruna
lender.loan_because: I am capable of it and I want to make a difference in the lives of others who are not so fortunate.

lender.name: Mason
lender.loan_because: I want to learn about people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Gathering experiences

lender.name: Luciane
lender.loan_because: I don't take life for granted - what goes around, comes around and there are so many people in need in this world that each person has to make his/her part to help.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing way for a college student to do a small part around helping those less fortunate around the world
lender.occupational_info: I am attending a university. There I am studying the Arabic language and the many cultures of the Middle East

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want to partner with people who have big dreams. I've been blessed in my life-- time to share!
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a children's hospital. I love working with kids... they are resilient, strong, and fun!

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: we all make the world better together ! The chain is only as strong as the weakest link.

lender.name: Daniel R.
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are not as fortunate start a business.

lender.name: JohnBoz
lender.loan_because: I want to help struggling entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Rob & Anne
lender.loan_because: Enjoy being able to help people help themselves in a small way.

lender.name: Adeel
lender.loan_because:
(O Prophet!) Tell those of My servants who believe that they should establish Prayer and spend out of what We have provided them with, both secretly and openly, before there arrives the Day when there will be no bargaining, nor any mutual befriending. Quran (14:31)
You shall not attain righteousness until you spend out of what you love (in the way of Allah). Allah knows whatever you spend. Quran (3:92)
Abu Qatadah related that the Prophet peace be upon him said: If anyone would like Allah to save him from the hardships of the Day of Resurrection, he should give more time to his debtor who is short of money, or remit his debt altogether. (Sahih Muslim)
lender.occupational_info: Medical Student

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: casting my bread upon the waters, so to speak
lender.occupational_info: I help care for people with mental illness in a psychiatric hospital in Houston, TX.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: John PB
lender.loan_because: It might help someone achieve something worthwhile.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: This is a chance to help those who may not be able to get help any other way.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from a software company. Currently, I do medical transcriptions from home.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because:
I believe this is one of the best ways to help the poor and needy. A free hand-out is one given to someone with some mis-trust in how they are to spend it, and without any responsibility.
This, however, seems to be a fantastic solution.
lender.occupational_info: I design images and pages you see on the internet for the students that attend college at Cleveland Clinic medical school. http://www.ccf.org/cclcm

lender.name: Nicol
lender.loan_because: .... I' ve lived in India for a period and I understand how small efforts can really have great impact of people's lifes.

lender.name: deb & wendy
lender.occupational_info: we both work in independent schools.

lender.name: Natascha
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Organisations can hire me to help them organize there processes/work/department in a way the quality gets better with less effort.

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: I love that fact that I can reach across this planet, touch people so far away and make a positive difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I share information about my clients and the products or services they have to offer. I also paint pictures.

lender.name: Michel
lender.loan_because: I believe in human solidarity and a better sharing of wealth.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I am enrolled in a class called International Human Rights. It makes me want to help others out.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school

lender.name: ETHODE
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: We are a web development and design company located in Medina Ohio

lender.name: Mathieu
lender.loan_because: I don't likethe way the global financing system is going right now. I think banking should be a matter of helping people not enslaves them.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
I don't consider myself well off or 'financially rich' but I treasure the things that I do have in my life; family, friends, health, and general comfort.
I never have to worry about when or where my next meal will be. I will always have the warmth in my home and the comfort of my own bed. And, for these simple yet magnificent reasons, I am ever grateful to be so fortunate.
So, to answer the question: I loan because I consider it very important to lend a hand whenever you are in that position to lend that hand.

lender.name: Felipe
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: It is the best investment I can make
lender.occupational_info: I look at many many numbers about the US economy and tell their story

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: It helps less fortunate people than myself.
lender.occupational_info: Project management/development in the construction industry.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe in doing something personal to help work against poverty in the world. Though we are told "the poor will be with you always," I believe this is a challenge set before each and everyone of us - to find someone to learn to be generous with.
lender.occupational_info: I am the pastor of a small Lutheran congregation on one of the Indian reservations in the state of Montana.

lender.name: Mollie
lender.loan_because: I feel connected to those I lend to and offer my energy and funds to their projects.
lender.occupational_info: To improve a person's mental health through therapy, medications (if needed) and compassionate listening.

lender.name: Mohna
lender.loan_because: Look what we can do!

lender.name: Jerrod
lender.loan_because: I simply believe in micro-credit.
lender.occupational_info: I serve in a local church and work to bring community initiative of justice and creativity to the public

lender.name: Jo The Chef
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody needs a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: We teach and cook for youth at risk

lender.name: AYERE
lender.loan_because: i loan because i want to travel to Europe or AMERICA to work and continue my education i also willing to work with any person who want to loan me . I can not continue my education because they is no money
lender.occupational_info: I am a building construction student i had my hight school diplomal which is equivilend to higher technician

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I want whoever I support to pay it forward and provide random acts of kindness to 3 people they think they can help !

lender.name: Jennifer Kurtz
lender.loan_because: The world would be a better place if everyone knew the joy of sharing. And I love making other people smile!
lender.occupational_info: Just taking care of my kids. I can be found on FaceBook

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Small change is better than no change.

lender.name: Candy
lender.loan_because: All people deserve a chance to better their lives and improve their circumstances. It's up to us if we want to help.

lender.name: Kakbank Asp
lender.loan_because: We enjoy to meet and to give opportunities to others!
lender.occupational_info: We are a growing group of families in Asp, Strngns Sweden we meet, eat and lend money.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: i have lived in developing countries and know what a huge difference a tiny bit of money can make!

lender.name: Martina
lender.loan_because: this is a great idea and i love it also because people get help who are not accepted customers by "normal" banks.

lender.name: benjamine
lender.whereabouts: st dizant du gua charente maritime

lender.name: Amity
lender.occupation: combat medic in the WA army national gaurd

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I have travelled to many beautiful places, and always the people are very welcoming, no matter what state of financial stability they are in. I happen to live in a country where opportunity is in abundance for those wishing to take it. In most places of the World, opportunity does not exist, or is reserved to very few. This is but a ripple in a pond, but at least it's a start to something with huge potential.
lender.occupational_info: I manage and advise investments to Wealthy individuals and families.

lender.name: Vulcan Electric
lender.loan_because: We believe in encouraging entrepreneurs, and giving them a chance to help themselves. We loan to Kiva rather than give useless golf tournament or christmas swag to our customers. We encourage them to join us in making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We manufacturer Battery chargers.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: Quiero apoyar a todas las mujeres del mundo para que ellas mejoran las condiciones de sus familias.

lender.name: Rainer
lender.loan_because: To help ending global poverty. giving other people a opportunity to build their own business. Give back some of what life has given me.
lender.occupational_info: Brokerage of commercial properties in Florida, development of small mixed used real estate projects and real estate advisory services for foreign owner of commercial real estate in the USA

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I know it can make a direct and immediate difference in the lives of individuals and their families. KIVA loans help financially, but also respect and reinforce the receiver's dignity, empower them and convey friendship and soidarity.
lender.occupational_info: I work on solving social challenges and realizing opportunities to make the world a little better here in Canada and internationally. I work with people in governments, non-profit organizations and businesses who want to work together to make good things happen. I provide research, coordination, policy development and other supports to initiatives to help make them successful.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I think that the lack of access to capital is one of the main reasons businesses fail. If I can help in even a small way with this issue, and allow individuals the chance to achieve their full economic potential, then I am doing something valuable.
lender.occupational_info: I help socially and economically disadvantaged construction businesses work with the US government

lender.name: Captain Jack
lender.occupation: Just a kid with a big heart
lender.loan_because: Every little bit can make a difference

lender.name: Tom and Finn
lender.loan_because: These individuals or groups asked for my assistance. I believe in this person or group and know that they will use this money to improve their lives and those around them. A single mustard seed grows into a large bush which provides shelter to many.
lender.occupational_info: Seeking justice and fairness for the disadvantaged.

lender.name: Laily & Amir
lender.loan_because: In loving memory of dad.

lender.name: Arielle
lender.loan_because: I struggled most of my life but now i have enough

lender.name: Mark & Terri
lender.occupation: Creates medical sets for Movies & TV

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I believe in global public service.

lender.name: Gary & Sharon
lender.loan_because: We too, are hopeful and believe in a future full of better things and life
lender.occupational_info: self employed sales

lender.name: Becky & Scott
lender.loan_because: Both of us have been entrepreneurs in the past. It's not enough just to believe in yourself. You need others who understand your vision.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: It's a practical way to share my luck in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with women and young children.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I can, I want to, and I believe we must share what we can with those in need.
lender.occupational_info: The organization I work for, refurbishes donated computers and gives them to hard working students who do not have a computer in their home, bridging the digital divide and furthering their academic achievements.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-credit as a sound and pragmatic solution and because I believe solidarity and collective action is what we need more of...
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research on nonprofit organizations and social economy enterprises.

lender.name: Jackie & Timothy
lender.loan_because: We respect the people for their creativity and hard work that it take to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We help others who want to help themselves! We teach handicapped to ski and horseback ride and to achieve the possible. We teach children to learn and to care about wildlife that live in our mountain community.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: we all need to take care of each other as much as we can!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the office of a Certified Financial Planner helping clients reach their financial goals.

lender.name: Mountain Cat
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the opportunity to reach women in the world on a personal basis
lender.occupational_info: Now retired from working with educators, caregivers and parents, encouraging them to use Educational TV and Internet Resources responsibly for the benefit of their children.

lender.name: Kubra
lender.loan_because: we are not born with the same opportunities and every human deserves to have a chance at least once in life to explore his/her potential.

lender.name: Tommi
